name: Anime Nazi Biohazard
description:
Anime Nazi Biohazard - a Japanese girl ended up in a Nazi camp, where they conducted experiments on people and animals. The Nazis are still guarding the camp. We need to end this infection.

In the game, you play as a cute Japanese girl and get on an island guarded by the Nazis, you need to stop them, rip off their posters, destroy their equipment and kill them all.

This game is a shooter with horror elements

What awaits you in the game:
  • The task that you need to complete to complete the game.
  • Opponents who will stop you.
  • Weapon for you, with which you destroy opponents.
